description: This file sets up a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) agent using various components such as knowledge base, embedder, reranker, and language model, and executes a sample query.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: The main class representing the AI agent that interacts with knowledge base and language models.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing and searching embeddings.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: A class for creating a knowledge base from URLs.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class for generating text embeddings using OpenAI models.

classes.name: CohereReranker
classes.description: A class for reranking search results using Cohere models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat-based language model.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response from the agent based on a query.
